value.string:
Command: IF-Else -> Web Control
Tag Name: IF-Else_WebControl

Usecase 1: If Web Control Exists Condition on Link Control
Select Command : Web Control Exists
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Control Details : Type : Hyperlink | Name : Link.html | URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Caption : Link.html

Usecase 2: If Web Control Exists Condition on Link Control
Select Command : Web Control Exists
Specify Website URL/Page : Select Page : ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Control Details : Type : Hyperlink | Name : Link.html | URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Caption : Link.html

Usecase 3: If Web Control Does Not Exist Condition on Link Button Control
Select Command : Web Control Does Not Exist
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/Checkbox/Checkbox.html
Control Details : Type : Hyperlink | Name : Link1.html | URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 5
Search the control in a page by : Caption : Link1.html

Usecase 4: If Web Control Does Not Exist Condition on Link Control
Select Command : Web Control Does Not Exist
Specify Website URL/Page : Select Page : ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Control Details : Type : Hyperlink | Name : Link2.html | URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) :5
Search the control in a page by : Caption : Link2.html
